joke.content: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!

joke2.content: Parallel lines have so much in common. It's a shame they'll never meet.

joke3.content: I used to play piano by ear, but now I use my hands.

joke4.content: Did you hear about the mathematician who's afraid of negative numbers? He'll stop at nothing to avoid them.

joke5.content: What do you call a fish with no eyes? Fsh.

joke6.content: I'm on a seafood diet. I see food, and I eat it.

joke8.content: What's orange and sounds like a parrot? A carrot.
